title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] UN-3115 [FIX] - Ollama Adapters Failing post LiteLLM Migration
summary:
## What

- Fix Ollama LLM adapter connection issue where api_base URL was being lost during validation
- Fix Ollama Embedding adapter to correctly prefix model names with ollama/ for litellm compatibility

## Why

- The validate() method in both OllamaLLMParameters and OllamaEmbeddingParamete

title: [PR] Design content pipeline for user-generated content
summary:
This commit introduces a comprehensive content strategy inspired by Unix history resources (like Spinellis's Unix History Repository) and developer content platforms (like Warp Terminus).
